title: Mobile App-Based Education for Neonatal and Pediatric Medication Dosage Calculation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic skills, experience in pediatric patient care, and understanding of basic medication administration concepts
context.additional_context: A practice-focused training program for workplace health managers, utilizing learning environments through smartphone-based apps

learning_goals: Learners can calculate recommended medication dosages for neonates and children by weight with 90% accuracy.
Learners can determine dosages in real clinical scenarios using a mobile app interface.
Learners can identify five or more potential errors in the medication calculation process and explain preventive procedures.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
